data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Caterino, Michael S., Tishechkin, Alexey K. (2013): A systematic revision of Operclipygus Marseul (Coleoptera, Histeridae, Exosternini). ZooKeys 271: 1-401, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.271.4062, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.271.4062
